headline: BROOKS AUTOMATION WAFER ROBOT
specstable:
Manufacturer Brooks Automation
Model VTR5
Description Vacuum Atmosphere Robot
Accessories Robot m/n 001-5500-02, p/n 001-1951-05 REV. C13
Other Information Wafer size: 100 mm to 200 mm
Load capacity: 1.1 Lbs
Radial axis
  • Range: 211 mm to 735 mm center line of robot
  • Resolution: 0.0001 in
  • Repeat: 0.01 in
    Rotational axis
  • Range: -2.5 Deg to 362.5 Deg
  • Resolution: 0.0009 Deg
  • Repeat: 0.02 Deg
    Z Axis
  • Range: 0.984 in
  • Resolution: 0.00064 in
  • Repeat: 0.001 in
  • Water cooled mounting plate
Condition Very Good
